item.title: Future Lions 2024 - Submissions from the classroom
item.description: Future Lions 2024 - Submissions from the classroom This year’s Future Lions competition brief was brought by Spotify. The brief was as follows: How can Spotify spread positivity by using technology to bring listener closer to the creators and communities they love? Here are the submissions from my classroom: Spotify Voice | 2024 Spotify Museum | 2024 Spotify Spotifind | 2024 Spotify Spoke AI | 2024 Spotify Spoof AI | 2024
